objectives.name: Develop and execute a robust portfolio of well-resourced conservation projects to achieve key milestones towards our 2030 goal
objectives.description: Focus on protecting 15,000 acres through priority area projects in WA and ID. Maintain full project pipeline striving to move at least 50 projects through Evaluation and Development by 2030.

strategies.name: Define INLC's service area and complete 50+ priority area projects
strategies.description: Implement Priority Area plan, conduct annual outreach with 50 landowners and 20 conservation professionals, define service area with partner land trusts, develop stable of inactive projects ready for funding.

tactics.name: Resource delegation for Priority Area plan implementation
tactics.description: Determine goals for outreach and projects within each priority area. Delegate staff hours. Develop and maintain 10 projects per conserve staff member.

kpis.name: Acres conserved (annual)
kpis.notes: Annual acres permanently conserved toward 15k goal by 2030

kpis.name: # of priority conservation projects completed or in pipeline
kpis.notes: Cumulative count of priority projects toward 50+ by 2030

kpis.name: % of conservation easements monitored
kpis.notes: Annual monitoring of all conservation easements to ensure 100% compliance

kpis.name: # of restoration projects funded/underway
kpis.notes: Number of funded habitat restoration projects on conserved lands

kpis.name: Landowner stewardship gatherings hosted
kpis.notes: Annual gatherings to engage and support conservation landowners

tactics.name: Complete annual outreach with landowners and professionals
tactics.description: Conduct outreach with 50 landowners and 20 conservation professionals throughout INLC service area. Document conservation barriers.

kpis.name: # of landowners and professionals engaged
kpis.notes: Landowners and advisors engaged through outreach events and site visits

tactics.name: Define INLC service area with partner land trusts
tactics.description: Work with Palouse Land Trust to delineate work areas in Shoshone County. Continue communication with Kaniksu Land Trust for Bonner County.

tactics.name: Develop stable of inactive projects ready for funding
tactics.description: Build pipeline of projects that are fully prepared but awaiting funding sources.

strategies.name: Define Community Conservation objectives and criteria
strategies.description: Define Community Conservation Project criteria including willing landowners, feasibility, project duration. Develop project selection and evaluation tool. Clarify policy for Conservation Opportunity and Special Projects fund.

tactics.name: Define a Community Conservation Project
tactics.description: Define criteria: What is a willing landowner? How does feasibility affect selection? How long should a project take? Bring proposal through LPC.

tactics.name: Develop project selection and evaluation tool
tactics.description: Create evaluation tool for assessing Community Conservation Projects.

tactics.name: Clarify policy for Conservation Opportunity and Special Projects fund
tactics.description: Conserve team makes proposals for policy changes. Reviewed by directors, approved by board.

strategies.name: Implement strategic process for agency relationship building
strategies.description: Track and maintain relationships with regional elected officials. Plan for and launch Advocacy Committee to secure conservation funding and planning support.

strategies.name: Develop Conservation Buyers cohort and mini-campaign strategy
strategies.description: Plan and launch Conservation Buyers cohort cultivation strategy. Plan for ongoing project-specific mini-campaigns to fund completion of specific projects.

strategies.name: Host landowner gathering and expand landowner engagement
strategies.description: Host inaugural landowner gathering to share resources and build community. Build processes for evaluating and funding restoration projects.

objectives.name: Build a broader community of conservation allies and champions by (re)connecting people to the land and expanding partnerships, education, and engagement opportunities
objectives.description: Expand community engagement through Glen Tana, develop Idaho presence, build tribal partnerships, launch Future Leaders program, and hire Engagement Director.

strategies.name: Launch and expand Leveraging Glen Tana community engagement strategy
strategies.description: Phase 1: House demolition and site prep. Expand community engagement programming. Plan for Phase 2 site build-out and capital campaign.

tactics.name: Launch Phase 1 of Leveraging Glen Tana: House demolition and site prep
tactics.description: Complete house demolition and prepare site for community engagement activities.

tactics.name: Continue and expand community engagement programming at Glen Tana
tactics.description: Develop and implement community engagement programming offerings at Glen Tana site.

kpis.name: Volunteer & community participants engaged
kpis.notes: Annual count of volunteers, students, and community participants engaged

kpis.name: Volunteer stewardship events hosted
kpis.notes: Number of volunteer events or workshops hosted per year

tactics.name: Develop plans for Phase 2: Site build-out
tactics.description: Create comprehensive plans for Glen Tana Phase 2 facility build-out.

strategies.name: Expand Idaho engagement and donor development
strategies.description: Fill project pipeline with compelling ID projects. Plan and implement ID community engagement activities. Develop 1 new high-visibility Community Conservation site in ID.

tactics.name: Fill project pipeline with compelling ID projects
tactics.description: Continue filling pipeline with compelling Idaho projects that will inspire more ID support.

tactics.name: Plan for ID community engagement activities
tactics.description: Plan and implement ID community engagement activities. Use ID projects to recruit, retain, develop ID donors.

tactics.name: Develop 1 new high-visibility Community Conservation site in ID
tactics.description: Identify, develop, and launch one high-visibility Idaho community conservation site.

kpis.name: New community conservation site in Idaho
kpis.notes: Establishment of a high-visibility Idaho site for community conservation

strategies.name: Build intentional relationships with regional Tribes
strategies.description: Plan for intentional relationship building with regional Tribes. Partner in hosting regional Tribal/Land Trust gathering. Create plan for inviting tribal representation into INLC board leadership.

tactics.name: Plan for intentional Tribal relationship building
tactics.description: Plan for intentional relationship building with regional Tribes. Continue nurturing existing relationships.

tactics.name: Partner in hosting regional Tribal/Land Trust gathering
tactics.description: Partner with Tribes to host regional Tribal/Land Trust gathering.

kpis.name: Tribal partnership engagement events
kpis.notes: Annual or biannual gatherings with Tribal partners to support shared conservation goals

tactics.name: Create plan for inviting Tribal representation into board
tactics.description: Create plan for inviting tribal representation into INLC board leadership positions or advisory capacity.

kpis.name: Tribal representation in governance
kpis.notes: Inclusion of Tribal members in board/advisory roles

strategies.name: Launch Future Leaders internship program
strategies.description: Plan Future Leaders internship program structure and budget to develop next generation of conservation leaders. Launch program in 2026.

strategies.name: Hire Engagement Director and expand engagement programming
strategies.description: Budget and plan for Engagement Director position. Hire director and expand programming, branding, marketing. Launch expanded marketing/branding campaign.

tactics.name: Budget and plan for Engagement Director position
tactics.description: Develop job description, budget, and hiring plan for Engagement Director and program.

kpis.name: Future Conservation Leaders internships
kpis.notes: Internship program for underrepresented groups in conservation

tactics.name: Hire Engagement Director
tactics.description: Execute recruitment process and hire Engagement Director.

tactics.name: Plan and launch expanded marketing/branding campaign
tactics.description: Develop and implement expanded marketing and branding campaign to increase visibility and membership.

strategies.name: Expand volunteer stewardship program
strategies.description: Continue existing volunteer engagement. Seek corporate partners to fund expanded volunteer stewardship program on conserved lands. Launch expanded program with Engagement Director.

strategies.name: Occupy office space/facilities by 2027
strategies.description: Assess current and future facilities needs via staff survey. Develop criteria for desired facilities. Create and implement timeline and funding plan for new/improved office spaces.

tactics.name: Assess current and future facilities needs - survey staff
tactics.description: Survey staff for what they want to see. Develop criteria for desired future facilities including office space, education space, plant nursery, or other spaces.

tactics.name: Create and implement timeline and funding plan for new office space
tactics.description: Create and implement timeline and funding plan for acquiring new office space(s) or improving existing spaces.

kpis.name: Office/facilities expansion
kpis.notes: Secure and occupy expanded office facilities by 2027

strategies.name: Conduct org-wide tech systems audit and develop multi-year plan by 2026
strategies.description: Conduct systems audit by end of 2025 prioritizing cyber security. Hire managed IT consultant. Develop 5-year plan for hardware/software acquisition, maintenance, and replacement.

tactics.name: Conduct systems audit by end of 2025
tactics.description: Conduct org-wide tech systems audit. Develop implementation plan and budget that prioritizes cyber security.

tactics.name: Hire consultant for full-service managed IT
tactics.description: Hire consultant to provide full-service managed IT. Designate in-office tech contact to work with consultant. REACH OUT TO OTHER NONPROFITS about what they're doing.

tactics.name: Develop 5-year plan for hardware and software
tactics.description: With assistance from consultant, develop plan and budget for acquiring, maintaining, and/or replacing hardware and software for next 5 years.

objectives.name: Diversify and grow the human and financial resources of our organization to achieve long term conservation impact
objectives.description: Create multi-year staff and board recruitment plans, implement facilities and technology improvements, expand member and corporate partner recruitment, develop donor stewardship portfolios, and build resilient funding model.

strategies.name: Create multi-year staff and board recruitment and development plans
strategies.description: Create and implement staff and board recruitment plans. Intentionally seek diverse backgrounds for open positions. Launch recruitment and development plans in 2026.

tactics.name: Create multi-year staff recruitment and development plan
tactics.description: Develop comprehensive multi-year plan for staff recruitment and professional development.

kpis.name: Total active members/donors
kpis.notes: Annual number of individual donors contributing to INLC

kpis.name: Major donors engaged
kpis.notes: Number of major donor prospects actively cultivated

kpis.name: Private philanthropy % of revenue
kpis.notes: Proportion of annual revenue from private donations, grants, and bequests

kpis.name: Annual operating revenue
kpis.notes: Total annual revenue supporting operations and growth

tactics.name: Create multi-year board recruitment and development plan
Launch staff and board recruitment and development plans
tactics.description: Begin implementation of recruitment and development strategies for both staff and board.

tactics.name: Intentionally seek diverse applicants for open positions
tactics.description: Actively recruit applicants of diverse backgrounds and experience for all open staff positions.

strategies.name: Use strategic plan to evaluate organizational effectiveness
strategies.description: Implement strategic plan to evaluate, redirect, celebrate staff and board effectiveness. Learn from and update plan/metrics to maintain momentum and relevance.

strategies.name: Sustain and expand member and corporate partner recruitment
strategies.description: Sustain existing member and corporate partner recruitment. Plan and budget for elevated programs. Implement expanded recruitment plans starting 2027.

strategies.name: Implement and expand donor stewardship portfolios
strategies.description: Implement expanded staff donor stewardship portfolios. Plan and implement board donor stewardship portfolios. Evaluate and adapt continuously.

strategies.name: Develop culture of philanthropy through training
strategies.description: Plan ongoing fundraising trainings and philanthropy team-building for staff and board. Implement training plan. Plan and implement Philanthropy Team recruitment.

strategies.name: Research and implement resilient funding model
strategies.description: Research funding models of similar-sized nonprofits. Plan for resilient, balanced revenue mix. Implement funding diversification plan.
